content:
# Factorio Agent Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at position (-9.5, -0.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump (position: -9.5, -0.5)
- Boiler (position: -6.0, 1.5)
- Steam engine (position: -1.5, 4.5)
- Connected with pipes between offshore pump and boiler (3 pipes) and boiler to steam engine (4 pipes)

### Iron Production Line at position (15.5, 70.5)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill (position: 15.5, 70.5) extracting iron ore
- Wooden chest (position: 15.5, 72.5) for ore storage
- Inserter (position: 16.5, 72.5) moving ore from chest to furnace
- Stone furnace (position: 16.0, 74.0) smelting iron ore to plates
- Assembling machine 2 (position: 21.5, 74.5) set to produce iron gear wheels
- Output inserter (position: 18.5, 74.5)
- Output chest (position: 19.5, 74.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Placement errors
- Cannot place entities on occupied tiles: Check tile availability before placing entities
- Cannot place entities too far away: Move closer to target position before placing (max distance is 10 tiles)

### Connection errors
- Transport belts cannot connect directly to furnaces: Always use inserters between belts and furnaces/assemblers

### Inventory management errors
- Attempting to insert items not in inventory: Check inventory before insertion attempts
- Full output chests stop production: Ensure output chests are emptied or add more storage

### Production optimization
- Mining drill stopped due to full chest: Add more furnaces or increase plate consumption
- Furnace has no ingredients: Ensure ore supply chain is properly connected
- Assembler missing resources: Verify input material supply chain is complete
